mapper.select: select c.idcurso as codigo, c.idcarrera as codcarrera, ca.nombre as carrera, c.idciclo as codciclo, ci.nomciclo as ciclo, s.idseccion as codseccion, s.nomseccion as nomseccion, c.nombre as nombre from curso c inner join carrera ca on c.idcarrera = ca.idcarrera inner join ciclo ci on c.idciclo = ci.idciclo inner join detallecursoseccion ds on c.idcurso = ds.idcurso inner join seccion s on ds.idseccion = s.idseccion where ds.idusuario = #{codigo} and ds.idestado = 1 order by c.idciclo ASC;
select idcarrera as codigo, nombre as nombre from carrera;
select idciclo as codigo, nomciclo as nombre from ciclo;

select c.idcurso as codigo, c.idcarrera as codcarrera, ca.nombre as carrera, c.idciclo as codciclo, ci.nomciclo as ciclo, c.nombre as nombre from curso c inner join carrera ca on c.idcarrera = ca.idcarrera inner join ciclo ci on c.idciclo = ci.idciclo where c.idciclo = #{idciclo};

select c.idcurso as codigo, c.idcarrera as codcarrera, ca.nombre as carrera, c.idciclo as codciclo, ci.nomciclo as ciclo, c.nombre as nombre from curso c inner join carrera ca on c.idcarrera = ca.idcarrera inner join ciclo ci on c.idciclo = ci.idciclo ORDER BY c.idciclo ASC LIMIT #{numpag},5;

select c.idcurso as codigo, c.idcarrera as codcarrera, ca.nombre as carrera, c.idciclo as codciclo, ci.nomciclo as ciclo, c.nombre as nombre from curso c inner join carrera ca on c.idcarrera = ca.idcarrera inner join ciclo ci on c.idciclo = ci.idciclo where c.idcarrera = #{codcarrera} and c.idciclo = #{codciclo} and c.nombre = #{nombre};

select c.idcurso as codigo, c.idcarrera as codcarrera, ca.nombre as carrera, c.idciclo as codciclo, ci.nomciclo as ciclo, c.nombre as nombre from curso c inner join carrera ca on c.idcarrera = ca.idcarrera inner join ciclo ci on c.idciclo = ci.idciclo where c.idcurso = #{codigo};
